title: ianaroti
author: ianaroti
content: I'm currently looking for a talented trader to join our trading academy Edgeframe. Edgeframe is a portfolio company of PaceVentures (https://www.paceventures.xyz). The ideal candidate would be an experienced trader with at least 3 years of experience, preferably in crypto trading. Fluency in English is also a must.At Edgeframe, we focus on providing our clients with high-quality trading education, mentorship, and support. As a trader at our academy, you will be responsible for developing and delivering training materials.To be considered for this role, you must have a deep understanding of trading principles, technical analysis, risk management, and portfolio management. You should also be able to demonstrate a successful track record of trading in various markets.In addition to your technical skills, we are looking for a trader who is passionate about helping others succeed in trading. You must have excellent communication skills and the ability to explain complex trading concepts in a clear and concise manner.If you meet the qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, please message me here, on linkedin (https://www.linkedin.com/in/max-miskow/)
